---

While this sinister-looking weapon isn't inherently evil, its unsettling appearance and powers particularly appeal to those who revel in causing pain. A _grisly scythe_ has a twisted thorny haft and a blade that appears to be rusted, but it functions as a _+1 [striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [wounding](/Equipment.aspx?ID=309) [scythe](/Weapons.aspx?ID=39)_.
